code:
﻿sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant API as /api/budgets/status
    participant AuthorizationMiddleware
    participant Db as FinancetrackerContext

    Client->>API: GET /api/budgets/status
    API->>AuthorizationMiddleware: validate token
    AuthorizationMiddleware-->>API: userId
    API->>Db: SELECT budgets WHERE userId INCLUDE Category
    Db-->>API: budgets
    API->>Db: SELECT transactions WHERE userId
    Db-->>API: transactions
    API->>API: compute per-budget Spent and Remaining
    API-->>Client: 200 OK [results]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
